com.madebyaron.genai.ai

Class Pool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madebyaron.genai.ai.Pool

  • public final class Pool
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a collection of networks. It is responsible for the calculation of the generations.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Pool.Evaluation
      The object holding each network's evaluation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Pool(Process process, java.util.Collection<Network> networks)
      Creates a new pool from the given networks.
      Pool(Process process, int size)
      Creates a new pool and fills it with new networks provided by the given process.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Pool.Evaluation createEvaluation()
      Creates a new evaluation to store the networks' evaluation.
      void generation(Pool.Evaluation evaluation, double purgeRatio)
      Calculates the next generation by randomly removing a given ratio of the networks then combining them to fill the pool again.
      java.util.List<Network> getNetworks()
      Returns the networks in this pool.
      Process getProcess()
      Returns the process that handles the generation of networks.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pool

        public Pool(Process process,
            int size)
        Creates a new pool and fills it with new networks provided by the given process.
        Parameters:
        process - The process handling the networks' generation (in normal cases it is equal to the process that evaluates the networks)
        size - The number of generated networks

      • Pool

        public Pool(Process process,
            java.util.Collection<Network> networks)
        Creates a new pool from the given networks.
        Parameters:
        process - The process handling the networks' generation (in normal cases it is equal to the process that evaluates the networks)
        networks - The networks in the pool

    • Method Detail

      • getProcess

        public Process getProcess()
        Returns the process that handles the generation of networks. In normal cases it is equal to the process that evaluates the networks.
        Returns:
        The process

      • getNetworks

        public java.util.List<Network> getNetworks()
        Returns the networks in this pool.
        Returns:
        An unmodifiable version of the networks.

      • createEvaluation

        public Pool.Evaluation createEvaluation()
        Creates a new evaluation to store the networks' evaluation.
        Returns:
        The new evaluation holder

      • generation

        public void generation(Pool.Evaluation evaluation,
                       double purgeRatio)
        Calculates the next generation by randomly removing a given ratio of the networks then combining them to fill the pool again.
        Parameters:
        evaluation - The evaluation holing each network's evaluation
        purgeRatio - The ratio of the removed networks (0 = none, 1 = all)
